title: What sans serif to complement MVB Sirenne?
content:
I will be using MVB Sirenne Text Bold ( [http://www.mvbfonts.com/html/fonts/sirenne/cs\_sirenne\_text\_bd.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20141216071446/http:/www.mvbfonts.com/html/fonts/sirenne/cs_sirenne_text_bd.htm "http://www.mvbfonts.com/html/fonts/sirenne/cs\_sirenne\_text\_bd.htm"))for a business card design.

However I want to use a sans serif font for the phone number, email and website on the same card. What would be a good pick for a legible (at around 8pt) sans serif to complement Sirenne?

Happy new year!
author: hackum

comments.content: I like it ... especially the Light weight. Thanks!
